Name: Type.Union
Description: Describe scenarios for various combinations of unions.

Properties.Description: This should be receive/send the up variant

Clients.Name: StringExtensibleNamed
Clients.Description: Describe union of string string | "b" | "c" but where the union is named and some of the variants are named
